name: Apple's Way
description:
Zero:Hour Game: "Apple's Way"

Short text adventure about Apple Newton lost in Space, looking for his friend Isaac. Can you help him find his friend in the vast space of space universe?

Game is educational, you will learn where in the space is Isaac (and planet Earth) located.

Made in 0 hours for ZERO:HOUR GAME JAM 2021, theme: GRAVITY.

Idea & Script: Lionel Korzár, DanQ
Code: Lionel Korzár
Graphics: DanQ
